item.title: What is a Napkin?
item.description: Akin to the “Ponderings” page, this collection of “Napkins” is a collection of ideas that I felt were better expressed in a series of paragraphs as opposed to a question. Some of the world’s best ideas were incarnated on a napkin, these might be a few of mine. â€‹ The rest of this page will be a collection of examples for different features supported in the variant of markdown powering this website – pretty stuff.
